description: News about New York City Police Department, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: New York City Police Department [NYPD]
title_page: New York City Police Department [NYPD] - The New York Times
maintext:
‘That Nurse Should Be Alive’: How Police Delays Left a Suspect at Large
The New York Police Department let a suspect in a Brooklyn rape case slip through its grasp. A month later he was arrested in connection with the murder of a nurse in Queens.
